channel.title: CVE Feed for Pivotal -- On Demand Services SDK
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pivotal -- On Demand Services SDK

item.title: CVE-2018-15759|2024-09-17T01:50:35.021Z -- pivotal -- on%20demand%20services%20sdk
item.description: Pivotal Cloud Foundry On Demand Services SDK, versions prior to 0.24 contain an insecure method of verifying credentials. A remote unauthenticated malicious user may make many requests to the service broker with different credentials, allowing them to infer valid credentials and gain access to perform broker operations.
